          <title>
            <string language="en">English words are made out of letters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Wörter werden aus Zeichen heraus 
gebildet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des mots anglais sont faits de lettres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As palavras inglesas são feitas fora das letras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le parole inglesi sono fatte dalle lettere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αγγλικές λέξεις γίνονται από τις επιστολές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las palabras inglesas se hacen fuera de cartas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that words in the English language are all made out of 26 letters.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">book</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">words</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß alle Wörter in der 
englischen Sprache bildeten aus 26 Zeichen heraus sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les mots dans 
l'anglais sont tous ont fait sur 26 lettres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as palavras na 
língua inglesa são todas fizeram fora de 26 letras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le parole nella 
lingua inglese sono tutte hanno fatto su 26 lettere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι λέξεις στην αγγλική
γλώσσα όλες γίνονται από τις 26 επιστολές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las palabras en el 
lenguaje inglés son todas hicieron fuera de 26 cartas.</string>
          </description>
